pyEchosign.exceptions package¶

Submodules¶

pyEchosign.exceptions.exceptions module¶

exception AccessTokenError(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘Access token not provided or invalid’¶
exception BaseEchosignException(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = None¶
exception FileTooLargeError(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
exception InvalidMultipart(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘An invalid multipart was specified.’¶
exception PermissionDenied(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘The API caller do not have the permission to execute this operation.’¶
exception ProcessingError(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘The transient document was deleted from the system because Adobe Sign could not process the document. This can happen if uploaded document contains scripts, macros or Visual Basic code. You may wish to inspect your document for these elements, remove them, and try uploading the document again.’¶
exception ResourceVirusDetected(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘The transient document was deleted because a virus was detected in the file.’¶
exception UnsupportedMediaError(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘Content type was not provided or is not supported.’¶
exception ApiError(message=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
base_echosign_error = ‘Received an error HTTP response code from the Echosign API’¶
